name: Last Light (Small Bug Games)
description:
Explore a dark cave full of riches and terror, your only light source is... magic dice?

Make your way through a pitch black cave system full of terrible monsters and valuable loot. Roll the dice to create a temporary light source, the higher the roll the more light created. With more light you can see farther, but you might attract more monsters...Find new weapons in chests, fight monsters, and reach the exit to move on to the next level.

Originally Made in 72 hours for Mini Jam 83, my second ever jam. The theme was dread and the limitation was that it must center around dice. 

This game is still unfinished, so expect more updates.
